title: Architectural Brick with Ogre Mask
artistDisplayName: China, from the pagoda at Xiuding Si (Xiuding Temple) at Mount Qingliang, near Anyang, Henan province
objectDate: Tang dynasty (A.D. 618–907), probably second half of 8th century
medium: Molded terracotta with traces of slip pigment
creditLine: Art Institute of Chicago. Purchased with funds provided by Mr. and Mrs. Kenneth Bro; Russell Tyson Fund
